mapper.insert: insert into iom_auth_log (id, project_num, project_name, contract_num, version, customer_name, phone, auth_code, client_code, register_man, register_time, valid_date, auth_user_num, auth_door_num, auth_cabinet_num, auth_view_num, auth_scene_num, status, CJR_ID, CJSJ, XGR_ID, XGSJ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{projectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{authUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authDoorNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authCabinetNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authViewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authSceneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjrId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update iom_auth_log set project_num = #{projectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_num = #{contractNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_code = #{authCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_code = #{clientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_man = #{registerMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid_date = #{validDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auth_user_num = #{authUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auth_door_num = #{authDoorNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auth_cabinet_num = #{authCabinetNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auth_view_num = #{authViewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auth_scene_num = #{authSceneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJR_ID = #{cjrId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CJSJ = #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_ID = #{xgrId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XGSJ = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select id, project_num, project_name, contract_num, version, customer_name, phone, auth_code, client_code, register_man, register_time, valid_date, auth_user_num, auth_door_num, auth_cabinet_num, auth_view_num, auth_scene_num, status, CJR_ID, CJSJ, XGR_ID, XGSJ from iom_auth_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
